name: Push The Button (kunic)
description:
Game made in ~3 days for Mini Jame Gam #10.

Push the Button is a brief 5-10 minute narrative-driven game. If you like Portal or Superliminal, you'll probably like Push the Button (though as it was made for a Jam, don't expect as much depth.)

PSA: For the best experience, please download the game. WebGL is provided as a convenience, but offers inferior performance (AKA you'll get stutters as new areas load) and visuals. Though if you're wanting to play on Web GL, it's heavily recommended to use a Chromium-based browser.  Firefox has a weird issue with the mouse controls.

Team: Just 1 dude with a heavy helping from the unity asset store.

Special Thanks:

  • Den of the Drake and The Bear Bard for additional voices
  • Crowe's Perch and Zydein for testing

Asset Credits:

  • Radio Music & some sound effects - Motion Array
  • Various sound effects - George Hufnagl, Sidearm Studios, GameMaster Audio, Universal Sound FX
  • Various icons -Qubits, KatGrabowska, Game Vanilla
  • Various models - Asset Store Originals, float3D, Polylabs, Elcanetay, Reynard Droste
